definitions.definition: To cause to feel less close or friendly ; alienate . To cease contact with (particularly of a family member or spouse, especially in form estranged ).
To remove from an accustomed place or set of associations .

main_definition: ( transitive ) To cause to feel less close or friendly ; alienate . To cease contact with (particularly of a family member or spouse, especially in form estranged ).
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To remove from an accustomed place or set of associations .
